Articles.Content:
It shouldn't matter, but it's always bugged me that temperature, goo, and other data isn't different during reentry. There are heat-effects flying past the ship, but the temp is the same as if there wasn't? I'd like to see science-data added for that, for educational purposes. I know Kerbal isn't a 100% realistic simulation, but just like parachutes don't work on the Mun, the fact that reentry is HOT could be something kerbals and people alike could learn!

 

Thanks for reading, thanks for making the game!
